actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the continuance of special health care coverage for retarded or handicapped dependents of certain members of the Armed Forces after the retirement of such members.

summary.text: Provides for the continuance of special health care coverage for retarded or handicapped dependents of the specified members of the Armed Forces after the retirement of such members. NAmends 10U.S.C. 1086)(By Request)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the continuance of special health care coverage for retarded or handicapped dependents of certain members of the Armed Forces after the retirement of such members.
